data.chText: （强调出乎意料）甚至，连，即使
data.enText: used to emphasize sth unexpected or surprising

data.chText: 他根本没打开过那封信。
data.enText: He never even opened the letter (= so he certainly didn't read it) .

data.chText: 那儿即使夏天也很冷。
data.enText: It was cold there even in summer (= so it must have been very cold in winter) .

data.chText: 就连小孩子也能理解。
data.enText: Even a child can understand it (= so adults certainly can) .

data.chText: 她甚至没打电话来说一声她不来了。
data.enText: She didn't even call to say she wasn't coming.

data.chText: （用以加强比较）甚至更，愈加，还
data.enText: used when you are comparing things, to make the comparison stronger

data.chText: 你对此事的了解甚至还不如我。
data.enText: You know even less about it than I do.

data.chText: 她甚至比她姐姐还聪明。
data.enText: She's even more intelligent than her sister.

data.chText: （引出更精确的说法）甚至可以说，其实，实际上
data.enText: used to introduce a more exact description of sb/sth

data.chText: 这栋建筑毫不美观，甚至可以说难看。
data.enText: It's an unattractive building, ugly even.
even as

data.chText: 正当；恰好在…时候
data.enText: just at the same time as sb does sth or as sth else happens

data.chText: 他正在高喊注意时，汽车就打滑了。
data.enText: Even as he shouted the warning the car skidded.
even if/though

data.chText: 即使；纵然；虽然
data.enText: despite the fact or belief that; no matter whether

data.chText: 我就是走也要走到那儿去。
data.enText: I'll get there, even if I have to walk.

data.chText: 尽管她有时可能很烦人，我还是喜欢她。
data.enText: I like her, even though she can be annoying at times.
even now/then

data.chText: 甚至到现在（或那时）；即便是这样（或那样）；尽管如此（或那样）
data.enText: despite what has/had happened

data.chText: 我把照片给他看了，即便是这样他仍然不相信我。
data.enText: I've shown him the photographs but even now he won't believe me.

data.chText: 甚至到那时她还是不肯认错。
data.enText: Even then she would not admit her mistake.

data.chText: 恰好在这时（或那时）
data.enText: at this or that exact moment

data.chText: 部队此刻正在准备向城里开进。
data.enText: The troops are even now preparing to march into the city.
even so

data.chText: 尽管如此；即使那样
data.enText: despite that

data.chText: 尽管有许多拼写错误，它仍不失为一篇佳作。
data.enText: There are a lot of spelling mistakes; even so, it's quite a good essay.
even/much/still less

data.chText: 更不用说；更何况
data.enText: and certainly not

data.chText: 连个解释都不给，就更不用说道歉了。
data.enText: No explanation was offered, still less an apology.

data.chText: 平滑；平
data.enText: smooth/level

data.chText: 平滑的；平的；平坦的
data.enText: smooth, level and flat

data.chText: 你需要有个平面在上面工作。
data.enText: You need an even surface to work on.

data.chText: 不变
data.enText: not changing

data.chText: （数量、速度等）变化不大的，均匀的，平稳的
data.enText: not changing very much in amount, speed, etc.

data.chText: 常年温度变化不大
data.enText: an even temperature all year

data.chText: 孩子学东西时快时慢。
data.enText: Children do not learn at an even pace.

data.chText: 相等
data.enText: equal

data.chText: 相等的；均等的
data.enText: equal or the same for each person, team, place, etc.

data.chText: 我们的比分现在相等。
data.enText: Our scores are now even.

data.chText: 食物的平均分配
data.enText: the even distribution of food

data.chText: 均衡的；不相上下的；同一水平的
data.enText: equally balanced or of an equal standard

data.chText: 势均力敌的竞赛
data.enText: an even contest

data.chText: 这两个运动员不分上下。
data.enText: The two players were pretty even.

data.chText: 数目
data.enText: numbers

data.chText: 双数的；偶数的
data.enText: that can be divided exactly by two
4, 6, 8, 10 are all even numbers .

data.chText: 大小相同
data.enText: same size

data.chText: 匀称的；均匀的；同样大小的
data.enText: equally spaced and the same size

data.chText: 匀称的面容；整齐的牙齿
data.enText: even features/teeth

data.chText: 平静
data.enText: calm

data.chText: 镇静的；稳重的；平和的，温和的
data.enText: calm; not changing or becoming upset

data.chText: 她的性情非常平和。
data.enText: She has a very even temperament.

data.chText: 当时他说话的声音平稳而镇静。
data.enText: He spoke in a steady, even voice.
be even

data.chText: 了账；扯平；两清；两抵
data.enText: to no longer owe sb money or a favour
be/get even (with sb)

data.chText: （向某人）报复；（跟某人）算账，摆平
data.enText: to cause sb the same amount of trouble or harm as they have caused you

data.chText: 这事我会找你算账的，等着瞧吧！
data.enText: I'll get even with you for this, just you wait.
break even

data.chText: 收支平衡；不赔不赚
data.enText: to complete a piece of business, etc. without either losing money or making a profit

data.chText: 这家公司去年接近收支平衡。
data.enText: The company just about broke even last year.
have an even chance (of doing sth)

data.chText: （做某事）有一半的机会；正反各半的可能性
data.enText: to be equally likely to do or not do sth

data.chText: 她明天多半会赢。
data.enText: She has more than an even chance of winning tomorrow.
on an even keel

data.chText: （生活、工作等经历困难后）平稳下来，顺顺当当
data.enText: living, working or happening in a calm way, with no sudden changes, especially after a difficult time
even the score

data.chText: 结清宿怨；摆平
data.enText: to harm or punish sb who has harmed or cheated you in the past
even out

data.chText: （在多变之后）变平坦，稳定下来
data.enText: to become level or steady, usually after varying a lot

data.chText: 房价一直时涨时落，但最终应该会趋于稳定。
data.enText: House prices keep rising and falling but they should eventually even out.
even sth↔out

data.chText: 平均分配；平均分摊
data.enText: to spread things equally over a period of time or among a number of people

data.chText: 他尽量把工作平均分配给雇员。
data.enText: He tried to even out the distribution of work among his employees.
even sth↔up

data.chText: 使拉平；使相等；使平衡
data.enText: to make a situation or a competition more equal

means: (引出更精确的说法)甚至可以说

ex.enText: The city was built on a level terrain.

ex.chText: 眼睛应该与画的上端齐平。
ex.enText: Your eyes should be level with the top of the picture.

synonyms.bx: 指平坦没有倾斜的；也指两事物齐平的，常后接介词 with。

ex.chText: 尽量把篱笆顶部弄平整。
ex.enText: Try to make the top of the hedge even.

ex.chText: 地球是圆的，而不是扁平的。
ex.enText: The earth is round but not flat.

ex.chText: 在干净、平整的桌面上工作。
ex.enText: Work on a clean, flat surface.

synonyms.bx: 指表面平滑的，无凹凸、倾斜或弯曲之处，但不一定是水平的。

ex.chText: 垂直线与水平线在此相交。
ex.enText: The vertical line meets the horizontal one here.

data.enText: even as

data.chText: 正当；恰好在…时候
data.enText: just at the same time as sb does sth or as sth else happens

data.chText: 他正在高喊注意时，汽车就打滑了。
data.enText: Even as he shouted the warning the car skidded.
even if/though

data.chText: 即使；纵然；虽然
data.enText: despite the fact or belief that; no matter whether

data.chText: 我就是走也要走到那儿去。
data.enText: I'll get there, even if I have to walk.

data.chText: 尽管她有时可能很烦人，我还是喜欢她。
data.enText: I like her, even though she can be annoying at times.
even now/then

data.chText: 甚至到现在（或那时）；即便是这样（或那样）；尽管如此（或那样）
data.enText: despite what has/had happened

data.chText: 我把照片给他看了，即便是这样他仍然不相信我。
data.enText: I've shown him the photographs but even now he won't believe me.

data.chText: 甚至到那时她还是不肯认错。
data.enText: Even then she would not admit her mistake.

data.chText: 恰好在这时（或那时）
data.enText: at this or that exact moment

data.chText: 部队此刻正在准备向城里开进。
data.enText: The troops are even now preparing to march into the city.
even so

data.chText: 尽管如此；即使那样
data.enText: despite that

data.chText: 尽管有许多拼写错误，它仍不失为一篇佳作。
data.enText: There are a lot of spelling mistakes; even so, it's quite a good essay.
even/much/still less

data.chText: 更不用说；更何况
data.enText: and certainly not

data.chText: 连个解释都不给，就更不用说道歉了。
data.enText: No explanation was offered, still less an apology.
be even

data.chText: 了账；扯平；两清；两抵
data.enText: to no longer owe sb money or a favour
be/get even (with sb)

data.chText: （向某人）报复；（跟某人）算账，摆平
data.enText: to cause sb the same amount of trouble or harm as they have caused you

data.chText: 这事我会找你算账的，等着瞧吧！
data.enText: I'll get even with you for this, just you wait.
break even

data.chText: 收支平衡；不赔不赚
data.enText: to complete a piece of business, etc. without either losing money or making a profit

data.chText: 这家公司去年接近收支平衡。
data.enText: The company just about broke even last year.
have an even chance (of doing sth)

data.chText: （做某事）有一半的机会；正反各半的可能性
data.enText: to be equally likely to do or not do sth

data.chText: 她明天多半会赢。
data.enText: She has more than an even chance of winning tomorrow.
on an even keel

data.chText: （生活、工作等经历困难后）平稳下来，顺顺当当
data.enText: living, working or happening in a calm way, with no sudden changes, especially after a difficult time
the honours are even

data.chText: 势均力敌；不分胜负
data.enText: no particular person, team, etc. is doing better than the others in a competition, an argument, etc.
even the score

data.chText: 结清宿怨；摆平
data.enText: to harm or punish sb who has harmed or cheated you in the past
even out

data.chText: （在多变之后）变平坦，稳定下来
data.enText: to become level or steady, usually after varying a lot

data.chText: 房价一直时涨时落，但最终应该会趋于稳定。
data.enText: House prices keep rising and falling but they should eventually even out.
even sth↔out

data.chText: 平均分配；平均分摊
data.enText: to spread things equally over a period of time or among a number of people

data.chText: 他尽量把工作平均分配给雇员。
data.enText: He tried to even out the distribution of work among his employees.
even sth↔up

data.chText: 使拉平；使相等；使平衡
data.enText: to make a situation or a competition more equal

tr: the latter part of the day (the period of decreasing daylight from late afternoon until nightfall)
example: he enjoyed the evening light across the lake

tr: equal in degree or extent or amount
example: even amounts of butter and sugar
it was a fifty-fifty (or even) split

tr: of the score in a contest
being level or straight or regular and without variation as e.g. in shape or texture
or being in the same plane or at the same height as something else (i.e. even with)
example: the road was not very even
the picture is even with the window
the even rhythm of his breathing

tr: used as an intensive especially to indicate something unexpected
example: declined even to consider the idea
I don't have even a dollar!

tr: to a greater degree or extent
example: looked sick and felt even worse
an even (or still) more interesting problem
still another problem must be solved
even when he is sick, he works
even with his head start she caught up with him

value.def: You use even to suggest that what comes just after or just before it in the sentence is rather surprising.

example.ex: He kept calling me for years, even after he got married...
example.tran: 多年来他一直打电话给我，甚至是在他结婚以后。

example.ex: Even dark-skinned women should use sunscreens...
example.tran: 即使黑皮肤的女性也应该涂抹防晒霜。

example.ex: I cannot come to a decision about it now or even give any indication of my own views...
example.tran: 现在我无法对此作出决定，甚至就连自己是什么观点也不能作任何暗示。

example.ex: He didn't even hear what I said.
example.tran: 他甚至没听见我说什么。

gramarinfo.label: ADV with cl/group, ADV before v

value.def: You use even with comparative adjectives and adverbs to emphasize a quality that someone or something has.

example.ex: It was on television that he made an even stronger impact as an interviewer...
example.tran: 作为采访者，是电视让他产生了更大的影响。

example.ex: During his second day Edward looked even more pale and quiet than on his first...
example.tran: 第二天，爱德华看起来比前一天更加苍白，也更加安静了。

example.ex: Stan was speaking even more slowly than usual.
example.tran: 斯坦说得比平常还要慢。

value.tran: （与形容词、副词的比较级连用）更加，愈发

value.def: You use even if or even though to indicate that a particular fact does not make the rest of your statement untrue.

example.ex: Cynthia is not ashamed of what she does, even if she ends up doing something wrong...
example.tran: 辛西娅不为自己的所作所为感到羞愧，即使最终证明她所做的是错误的。

example.ex: Even though I'm supposed to be working by myself, there are other people who I can interact with.
example.tran: 即便是需要我一个人工作，我还是可以和别人进行交流的。

value.def: If one thing happens even as something else happens, they both happen at exactly the same time.

example.ex: Even as she said this, she knew it was not quite true...
example.tran: 就在她说这个的时候，她知道自己说的并非全是真的。

example.ex: He had been aware, even as he slept, of the noise of the engine.
example.tran: 即使在睡觉的时候，他也一直听得到发动机的噪音。

value.def: You use even so to introduce a surprising fact which relates to what you have just said.

example.ex: The bus was only half full. Even so, a young man asked Nina if the seat next to her was taken...
example.tran: 公共汽车上只坐满了一半。尽管如此，一个年轻男子还是问尼娜她旁边的座位有没有人坐。

example.ex: She has never given up her nationality. Even so, her opponents argue that she is not a true Burmese.
example.tran: 她从未放弃过她的国籍。即便如此，反对者仍然说她不是真正的缅甸人。

value.def: You use even then to say that something is the case in spite of what has just been stated or whatever the circumstances may be.

example.ex: Peace could come only gradually, in carefully measured steps. Even then, it sounds almost impossible to achieve...
example.tran: 和平只会逐渐到来，而且每一步都走得小心翼翼。即使那样，要实现和平听起来仍几乎不可能。

example.ex: She was at her prettiest in her late teens, but even then she always had somebody who was prettier.
example.tran: 她在十八九岁的时候最漂亮，但是即使在那时，也总有人比她更漂亮。

value.def: An even measurement or rate stays at about the same level.

example.ex: How important is it to have an even temperature when you're working?...
example.tran: 工作时周围环境温度恒定有多么重要呢？

example.ex: The brick-built property keeps the temperature at an even level throughout the year.
example.tran: 那栋砖砌的房子里全年温度恒定。

example.ex: Stock is added evenly during the first 18 minutes while the mixture cooks...
example.tran: 在将混合在一起的食物进行烹煮的前18分钟内，均匀地加入高汤。

example.ex: He looked at Ellen, breathing evenly in her sleep.
example.tran: 他看着埃伦，她正呼吸均匀地睡着。

value.def: An even surface is smooth and flat.

example.ex: The tables are fitted with a glass top to provide an even surface.
example.tran: 桌子装了玻璃表面，因此十分平滑。

value.def: If there is an even distribution or division of something, each person, group, or area involved has an equal amount.

example.ex: Divide the dough into 12 even pieces and shape each piece into a ball...
example.tran: 将面团分成12等份，每份揉成球状。

example.ex: Many are tired of being unpopular because of their wealth and would encourage more even distribution of it.
example.tran: 很多人厌倦了因为自己的财富而不受欢迎，从而会鼓励更加均匀地分配财富。

example.ex: The meat is divided evenly and boiled in a stew...
example.tran: 那块肉被均匀切成小块放到炖菜里煮熟。

example.ex: Within manufacturing, the loss of jobs has been far more evenly spread across the regions...
example.tran: 在制造业，就业机会减少的现象已经在整个地区更加均匀地蔓延。

example.ex: The blood vessels in the skin are not evenly distributed around the face and neck.
example.tran: 皮肤下的血管在脸部和颈部分布不均匀。

value.def: An even contest or competition is equally balanced between the two sides who are taking part.

example.ex: It was an even game.
example.tran: 这是一场势均力敌的比赛。

example.ex: ...an even match between eight nations.
example.tran: 8个国家间一场不相上下的竞赛

value.tran: （比赛、竞争等）平衡的，不相上下的，势均力敌的

example.ex: They must choose between two evenly matched candidates for governor.
example.tran: 他们必须在两位不相上下的州长候选人之间作出选择。

value.def: If you are even with someone, you do not owe them anything, such as money or a favour.

example.ex: You don't owe me. I don't owe you. We're even.
example.tran: 你不欠我，我也不欠你，我们扯平了。

value.def: If your voice is even, you are speaking in a very controlled way which makes it difficult for people to tell what your feelings are.

example.ex: My voice surprised me; it was even and emotionless.
example.tran: 我的声音听起来心平气和、不露一丝感情，这让我自己颇感惊讶。

example.ex: 'Is Mary Ann O.K?' — 'She's fine,' she said evenly.
example.tran: “玛丽·安还好么？”——“她很好，”她平静地说。

value.def: An even number can be divided exactly by the number two.
If there is an even chance that something will happen, it is no more likely that it will happen than it will not happen.

example.ex: They have a more than even chance of winning the next election...
example.tran: 他们赢得下届选举的机会在五成以上。

value.tran: （成败机会）各半的，对半的，相等的

value.def: When a company or a persn running a business breaks even, they make neither a profit nor a loss.

example.ex: The airline hopes to break even next year and return to profit the following year...
example.tran: 那家航空公司希望明年实现收支相抵，在随后一年重新盈利。

example.ex: The theatre needs to fill over ninety per cent of its seats every night just to break even.
example.tran: 那家剧院每天晚上需要有90%以上的上座率才刚刚能够收支相抵。

value.def: If you say that you are going to get even with someone, you mean that you are going to cause them the same amount of harm or annoyance as they have caused you.

example.ex: I'm going to get even with you for this...
example.tran: 我会跟你算这笔账的。

example.ex: Don't get angry, get even.
example.tran: 与其生闷气，不如出口气。

trans: 收支平衡；收支相抵；不赔不赚
均匀分布；平均分配；平均分布；分布均匀
